short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Browse and download images on the web

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This Chrome extension allows users to browse and download images from web pages with additional features for image conversion. Here are the key features and components:

1. Image Browsing:

Extracts images from the current web page

Displays images in a grid layout

Allows filtering images by URL, size, and other criteria

2. Download Functionality:

Enables users to select multiple images for download

Provides options to rename files and specify a download folder

Offers a bulk download feature with confirmation dialog

3. Image Conversion:

Allows users to convert selected images to different formats (PNG, JPEG, WEBP)

Provides a global format selection for batch conversion

Displays current image formats and conversion status
